short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Any time you click LIKE on a Twitter™ user it will follow them!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whenever you like a tweet, you will automatically follow that user.  This is a quick way to focus on users that have content you enjoy and many less clicks.

Each time you click a LIKE button on Twitter™, a new tab will open, and if you are not following them it will follow for you and close the new tab.

 - You want to accomplish two things at the same time.
 - You do not have to hover over the user's profile to follow.
 - You don't have to worry about it unfollowing a user.
 - Unliking something does NOT unfollow the user.

Notice: If you like too many times too quickly, Twitter will display a "Rate Limited" notice. This extension was not designed to be a fast way to gain followers, it was designed to follow users you like the most. If you like a post by someone, you may like their other posts. This script is not intended to be used for automated processes or activity against Twitter Terms of Service.

Version 0.0.1
 - Opens a new tab and follows the Twitter user you liked.

Version 0.0.2

 - Users you have already liked are saved locally to prevent additional popups.
 - Bug fixes when detecting the Follow / Following button.
 - Unfollow is accidentally clicked, but a popup from Twitter was preventing the operation to complete - either way, this is now fixed.

Version 0.0.3

- New tab opens from Background, so you never see it - continue on your way liking and automatically following users you enjoy.
